Author: paperklipp
Text: I dreamt it was my birthday and a beautiful girl with long luscious blonde hair turned up and dramatically cut all her hair off with a kitchen scissors to steal my thunder and ruin my day so I binged on Lindt chocolate truffles.

Author: akatsuki_no_bun
Text: I have those dreams too! It’s always that I “forget” that I don’t eat certain things and go all out. They’re mostly super fun!   The only bad ones I have are about meat. I’m a vegetarian and sometimes I have dreams where I forget what meat is and eat it only to remember mid-dream and wake up crying. Those ones are a bad time 😅
